survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from students and staff on current sustainability initiatives and identify areas for improvement on campus.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall awareness of the sustainability initiatives currently implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for easy interpretation. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall awareness of the sustainability initiatives currently implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability programs are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture broad awareness.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability programs are you aware of? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in campus sustainability programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in campus sustainability programs?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture diverse suggestions. Keep the text box size appropriate.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in volunteering for sustainability programs on campus?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe options to gauge interest.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in volunteering for sustainability programs on campus?
